definition: person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
"zombie fans", fake followers that can be bought to boost one's popularity on Weibo, Baidu etc

sentences.english: After Thanatos is dead, the team can move on to blow immortals in order to save ammo.
sentences.chinese: 大蓝死后，队伍可以继续炸绿僵尸以节省弹药。

sentences.english: Synopsis: An amnesiac spy awakens in a world overrun by zombies.
sentences.chinese: 一个记忆缺失的特工在一个僵尸遍野的世界苏醒。

sentences.english: He decides to direct a zombie film based on the Jin-Young's script.
sentences.chinese: 他决定直接基于晋年轻脚本的僵尸电影。

sentences.english: Shoot down the zombies overrunning your house before they get to you in this horror shooting game.
sentences.chinese: 击落僵尸超越你的房子，才让你在这恐怖的射击游戏。

sentences.english: What you're looking at here are potential frozen zombies, aka wood frogs .
sentences.chinese: 你看到的有可能是一些冷冻僵尸，或者称为树蛙。

sentences.english: The “stunned” zombie is not allowed to tag a human for a predetermined length of time.
sentences.chinese: “晕厥”的僵尸在预定时间内不能再传染人类。

sentences.english: Buy the right car now, and you'll have no trouble outrunning the zombie apocalypse when it comes.
sentences.chinese: 趁现在买辆好车，好在僵尸来袭时冲出重围。

sentences.english: So I really like the zombie games and shooting adversaries and surviving.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢玩僵尸游戏，我喜欢射死对手，然后活下来。

sentences.english: The "stunned" zombie is not allowed totag a human for a predetermined length of time.
sentences.chinese: 晕匦驯的僵尸在预订时间内不能再传染人类。

sentences.english: Many will be unable to pay off the loan and risk becoming "zombie debtors".
sentences.chinese: 许多人将无法付清贷款，有可能会沦为僵尸负债人。

sentences.english: The word zombie comes from Haitian and New Orleans voodoo origins.
sentences.chinese: 僵尸一词来源于海地和新奥尔良伏都教起源。

sentences.english: We were all orphans in Zombieland.
sentences.chinese: 在僵尸之地的人其实都是孤儿。

sentences.english: The shotgun is a better anti-zombie strategy than cremation.
sentences.chinese: 相比火，散弹枪是更好的打僵尸武器。

sentences.english: The zombies will leap into it, get your machine gunner and move on to you.
sentences.chinese: 这种僵尸会跃到车上，抓住枪手，再向你移动。

definition: leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
